titles.title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to clarify the treatment of certain sports clothing.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5755-5757)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/11/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for the duty treatment of ski racing apparel designed to protect against the hazards of the sport of ski racing.
